faq.title: Common questions
faq.description: Answers to the most common questions about our websites and AI solutions.

q1.question: What type of businesses is this for?
q1.answer: Small and medium businesses, stores, service centers, auto parts shops, clinics, and organizations that frequently receive customer inquiries.

q2.question: Do I need technical knowledge?
q2.answer: No. We handle all configuration and installation. You only need simple admin access to edit your content.

q3.question: Why is there a monthly AI fee?
q3.answer: The AI system has ongoing costs for servers, usage, and monitoring, so a monthly fee is required.

q4.question: Can the AI replace staff?
q4.answer: AI only answers repetitive, simple questions. It does not completely replace human involvement.

q5.question: Can the AI replace my staff?
q5.answer: The AI is designed to handle repetitive and basic questions. It reduces workload but does not replace human staff for complex or sensitive cases.

q6.question: How long does setup take?
q6.answer: Website delivery usually takes 7–10 days. AI setup and training are completed alongside the website build.
